meanings.sent1: She had a housewifey smile that brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The apron she wore had a housewifey look to it.
meanings.sent3: Her housewifey ways made everyone feel at home.
meanings.sent4: The cozy kitchen had a housewifey charm that was inviting.
meanings.sent5: The scent of freshly baked cookies gave the house a housewifey feel.

meanings.definition: resembling or typical of a housewife
meanings.sent1: The neat bun in her hair was very housewifey.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit had a housewifey vibe with the floral pattern.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly called her organized desk her housewifey corner.
meanings.sent4: The vintage dress she wore was housewifey in style.
meanings.sent5: The cozy slippers she wore were quite housewifey.

meanings.definition: pertaining to the role or duties of a housewife
meanings.sent1: Her housewifey skills in cooking were unmatched.
meanings.sent2: She took care of the house with a housewifey dedication.
meanings.sent3: The way she organized the pantry was truly housewifey.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail in cleaning was very housewifey.
meanings.sent5: The way she managed the household was impressively housewifey.
